data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Equipment-Required Service with Auto-Maintenance. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Release Form / Liability Waiver (Legal Protection). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Minor Protection + Guardian Approval. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Waiver + Consent Gate. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
